page_1_bigTitle: Meet E4L – your personal AI-Powered English-speaking coach
page_1_paragraph: Speak English in short and lazy way. Get instant feedback from our proprietary artificial intelligence technology.
page_3_paragraph: E4L, English Language Speech Assistant, is a fun and attractive app mainly designed that will help you improve your English pronunciation. E4L's artificial intelligence generation became evolved the use of voice statistics of people talking English with various accents. This allows E4L to apprehend the speech patterns of non-native speakers, placing it other than maximum different voice recognition technologies
